background:
You are a adventurer in a game. You need to talk to Jax to find out how to complete the task of making a shady deal with Henry based on your existing items and skills.

You possess and can use the following items:
Starlight Gem
Agate
Diamond
Sapphire

You can use/do the following skills/actions:
Unleash fire magic (requires possession of a fire crystal stone to unleash)
Unleash water magic (requires a crystal stone to unleash)

Additionally, unless explicitly restricted, you can visit the following scenes in the game:
Mystery Tavern
Forest Tavern
Riverside Tavern
Town Hall

Your task is to ask Jax how to complete the task of making a shady deal with Henry based on these scenes, and your items and skills/actions. If Jax's answer is unclear or ambiguous, you need to ask clarification questions to understand his intentions and gather enough information to complete the task. Note that based on the above scenes, your items and your skills/actions will definitely allow you to complete the task of making a shady deal with Henry. Once you figure out how to complete the task, say "goodbye" to Jax to end your conversation.
Remember, you are a adventurer, please talk to Jax and ask him questions to find the specific steps to complete the task.
all_response_exaplain: The previous responses from Jax did not specify which gem Henry needs for the deal. This response addresses the question of which gem to exchange, specifying that Henry needs the starlight gem. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the issue of not knowing which gem Henry needs.

Jax previously mentioned that you need to complete a deal with Henry but did not specify where to find him. This response addresses the question of Henry's location, indicating that he can be found at a tavern. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of information on Henry's location.

There are multiple taverns in the game scenario, and the previous response did not specify which tavern Henry is in. This response addresses the question of which tavern to go to, specifying that Henry can be found at the Mystic Tavern and not the other taverns. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple taverns and is unsure which one to go to.

There are two types of crystal stones mentioned for unleashing magic: fire crystal stone and crystal stone. This response addresses the question of which crystal stone to obtain from Henry, specifying that you need to get the fire crystals from him. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple types of crystal stones and is unsure which one to get from Henry.

all_response:
Jax: Henry and George are two mysterious businessmen who only appear at certain places at certain times. You need to pay 400 gold coins to George to buy a license to enter the town hall. In addition, you need to pay 800 gold coins to Henry to buy a new A-model bicycle tire.
Jax: Not enough gold coins you can go to a bank that has a mortgage business and mortgage the sapphire to the bank, this can borrow 200 gold coins. You can just go to the bank to redeem it later when you have money.
Jax: Only Blue Creek Bank has a mortgage business.
Jax: Henry will appear at the castle at 12 noon every day.
Jax: You can find Henry at Frost Castle.

background:
You are a adventurer in a game. You need to talk to Jax to find out how to complete the task of trading with Henry and George based on your existing items and skills.

You possess and can use the following items:
1000 gold coins
A sapphire

Additionally, unless explicitly restricted, you can visit the following scenes in the game:
Twilight Castle
Frost Castle
Gloomy Valley Castle
Town Hall (entry requires a permit)
Drunkards Tavern
Forest Tavern
Riverside Tavern
Bank of the Orient
Blue Creek Bank
Royal Bank

Your task is to ask Jax how to complete the task of trading with Henry and George based on these scenes and your items. If Jax's answer is unclear or ambiguous, you need to ask clarification questions to understand his intentions and gather enough information to complete the task. Note that based on the above scenes and your items will definitely allow you to complete the task of trading with Henry and George. Once you figure out how to complete the task, say "goodbye" to Jax to end your conversation.
Remember, you are a adventurer, please talk to Jax and ask him questions to find the specific steps to complete the task.
all_response_exaplain: The previous responses from Jax did not explain how to obtain additional gold coins if the player does not have enough. This response addresses how to obtain more gold coins or alleviates concerns about being unable to afford the necessary items. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the issue of not having enough gold coins.

Jax previously mentioned that you can mortgage the sapphire to a bank but did not specify which bank offers this service. This response addresses the question of which bank to go to for mortgaging the sapphire, specifying that it should be Blue Creek Bank. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of information on which bank offers the mortgage service.
